title: Former Florida Covid-19 Data Scientist Faces Arrest
sub_head: Rebekah Jones said on Twitter that she planned on surrendering herself to custody Sunday evening
body:
Florida authorities are preparing to arrest a former Florida Department of Health data scientist suspected of illegally accessing a state-run messaging system used by emergency personnel.
The Florida Department of Law Enforcement has obtained an arrest warrant for Rebekah Jones, who has denied responsibility for any hacking and says authorities are targeting her for trying to expose manipulations to the state’s Covid-19 infection data.
Ms. Jones said on Twitter on Saturday that she planned on surrendering herself to custody Sunday evening.
“To protect my family from continued police violence, and to show that I’m ready to fight whatever they throw at me, I’m turning myself into police in Florida Sunday night,” she wrote.
“FDLE has an active arrest warrant for Ms. Jones,” a Florida Department of Law Enforcement spokesperson said in an email Sunday. “Our case remains active. Once she turns herself in, we’ll be able to provide the additional information for which you’ve asked.”
